author: Brodie Robertson | Linux Tips & Tricks
description:
December is a time for giving and if you're using open source it's a time to support the projects you use, of course if you can't afford to do so that's fine, but you can at least share posts like this around.

==========Support The Channel==========
► Patreon: https://brodierobertson.xyz/patreon
► Paypal: https://brodierobertson.xyz/paypal
► Liberapay: https://brodierobertson.xyz/liberapay
► Amazon USA: https://brodierobertson.xyz/amazonusa

==========Resources==========
KDE Fundraiser 2025: https://kde.org/fundraisers/yearend2025/
KDE Previous Donations: https://kde.org/community/donations/previousdonations/

title: Donate To An Open Source Project This Holiday Season
